text: وَلَا تُطِعِ ٱلۡكَٰفِرِينَ وَٱلۡمُنَٰفِقِينَ وَدَعۡ أَذَىٰهُمۡ وَتَوَكَّلۡ عَلَى ٱللَّهِۚ وَكَفَىٰ بِٱللَّهِ وَكِيلٗا
translation: Kandi ntukumvire namba abagarariji n’indyarya mu biciye kubiri n’ingingo z’ubwislamu, irengagize ibangamira ryabo, maze ushishikare gushikiriza ubutumwa, uheze wishimikize Imana Allah uyizere. Burya Imana Allah, Irakwiye kuba Umuhagarikizi Agukingira ibikubangamiye kw’isi no mu buzima bw’inyuma yo gupfa.
